short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool for converting lengths in architectural scales.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple and free tool for architecture and engineering professionals and students. Includes unit of measurements of centimeters, meters, inches and feet.
